desc: Organic - Vegan - Ethical - Plant Based - Palm Oil Free - Fair Trade - Gluten Free - Soy Free - Sustainable - Plastic Free - Award Winning Luxury Dark Chocolates

layout.text: We have planted over 10,000 trees in the last 12 months.
When you buy Pacari chocolate from us, we plant trees, help us to plant many more.
Pacari it is not only a delicious chocolate, but the best for our planet Earth.
Pacari is your delicious, vegan, organic, fair trade chocolate made in Ecuador, the land of the origins of cacao.
